room_title: Escape room "Double Crossed" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
room_description:
You planned out the perfect job… every meticulous detail was thought of…. It was the perfect crime. What you didn’t plan for was your partner betraying you! After stealing the Hope Diamond, you were betrayed by one of your own. Your partner, The Wolf, in a bit of irony, has stolen the diamond from you and your team and hidden it inside the world’s securest bank where it will stay until he sells it. You know that the buyer will be making the purchase from him tomorrow. 
Do you and your team have it in you to pull off one more job? Can you break into the bank, find out the Wolf’s true identity and re-steal the diamond? You have 60 minutes to prove you are as good as you think and get redemption for his betrayal. Good luck!
